description: Perfect location to rent for the NYC holiday season! It is located on a classic tree lines block in Park Slope...just a few blocks from Prospect Park, which features ice skating and farmers markets. Just 1 block from the R train and about 5 blocks from the F train, which will get you into Manhattan in about 15-20 minutes.  About 5 minutes from the now famous Barclays Center.  Surrounded by great restaurants, bars and shops.  The apt has a fantastic kitchen, washer/dryer and lots of space!
name: Great 1 Bedroom in the heart of Brooklyn!
review: Great, clean space. Walkable neighborhood, near shops and cafes.
